parameters.name: AppendFlag
parameters.description: True appends the entity to the selection list, false replaces the selection list with the entity

title: IView.ISelectEntity
description: Selects an entity in this drawing view.
signature:
System.Boolean ISelectEntity( 
   Entity
Entity
,
   System.Boolean
AppendFlag
)

parameters.name: AppendFlag
parameters.description: True appends the entity to the selection list, false replaces the selection list with the entity

returns: True if the entity was selected, false if not
